name: UFO: Take that thing!
description:
You are known in your world as the breaker of zognoids. His last mission did not contribute much to his fame.

Your superior has given you one last chance to prove yourself fit for the job. The problem was that it will be on the worst planet of all, where not even the interns like to go, it is called Earth by the inhabitants.

Good luck on catching all the samples of things your superiors want!

Its my first game, so I made only two fases dont be mad, please :)
